correct_order: In an experiment, 36 pet dogs were brought to an open area in Maisons-Laffitte, France, with their owners.
After a 15-minute free period, the owner-dogs pairs experienced three testing conditions presented in random order.
These were: stay-still, normal-walk, and fast-walk.
Importantly, the dogs’ owners were told not to look at, or talk to, their dogs – or to show any evident emotion.
The experimenters filmed the trials as they occurred.

In an experiment, 36 pet dogs were brought to an open area in Maisons-Laffitte, France, with their owners.
